darkMode.Label: Colour Scheme
darkMode.Hint: Choose a colour scheme for the sheet to follow.

expandedLimited.Label: Use Expanded Sheet as Limited
expandedLimited.Hint: Show the full character sheet for users who have the Limited permission for a given Actor.

showFullCurrencyNames.Label: Show full currency names
showFullCurrencyNames.Hint: Show the full currency names (Gold, Silver, Platinum) instead of the abbreviated names (GP, SP, PP). You will need to close and reopen the character sheet for this setting to take effect.

showSpellSlotBubbles.Label: Show spell slot bubbles
showSpellSlotBubbles.Hint: Shows remaining spell slots as full or empty squares, a la DnDBeyond. You will need to close and reopen the character sheet for this setting to take effect.
